title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ChatGPT users dismayed as OpenAI pulls popular models GPT-4o, o3 and more — enterprise API remains (for now)
items.description: OpenAI has announced GPT-5 will replace all models on ChatGPT. Many users are mourning the workhorse model.

items.title: Orbbec touts Pulsar ME450 as a multi-pattern 3D lidar

items.title: It’s a new era of central-bank dissent with a whiff of stagflation in the air
items.description: It’s an era of unprecedented central bank dissension — and agreement is hard to find when the goals are in conflict.

items.title: ‘This scam stuff is going to get worse’: A man approached me in my car — he had a crazy story
items.description: “I got rid of him by asking for a business card and a company name, and he bugged out.”

items.title: ‘Billions’ in Medicare waste? Read the fine print.
items.description: Yet another investigation into federal government spending has found that “waste, fraud and abuse” is a lot less than some people say.

items.title: Gold is flying higher — a report of gold-bar tariffs is doing the trick

items.title: Black Hat 2025: Why your AI tools are becoming the next insider threat
items.description: Black Hat 2025 delivered performance metrics from beta programs and agentic AI deployments, proving results are being delivered over hype.
